description:
http://anidb.net/ch119241 [Ryuusei]`s friendly rival. Touma used to be the leader of the Sokai High School GUNPLA club but, aspiring to become a pro GUNPLA Fighter to support his family, he transferred to a high school affiliated with Gokusode University. Despite his cool appearance, he has a bold and aggressive battle style.
Source: gundam.info
name: Aizen Touma
